'''''The Invisible Hand''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat a [[Primal Construct]] without disabling its invisible state.
<!--
==Gameplay Notes==
-->

==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement is a reference to the metaphor of the {{w|invisible hand}} in economics.
